short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Button to the player of 8tracks.com to blacklist bad tracks and always skip these songs in every playlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get rid of that one bad song in your most loved playlists!
Put it on your blacklist and let it skip automatically if it pops up. Sync with other devices.

Manage your blacklist in the extension options page on chrome://extensions/

Disclaimer: "8tracks player" is not affiliated with 8tracks.com
